sentences.en: an area of 2,000 square miles
sentences.cn: 2,000平方英里的面积

sentences.en: Crime rates are much higher in urban areas.
sentences.cn: 城镇地区的犯罪率要高很多。

sentences.en: He has lived and farmed in the area for 46 years.
sentences.cn: 他已在此地生活耕作了46年。

sentences.en: Health officials have successfully confined the epidemic to the Tabatinga area.
sentences.cn: 卫生官员成功地将疫情控制在塔巴廷加地区。

sentences.en: His office was a disaster area of papers and full ashtrays.
sentences.cn: 他的办公室一片狼藉，文件成堆，烟灰满缸。

sentences.en: Measure the floor area of the greenhouse and divide it by six.
sentences.cn: 量一下温室的建筑面积再将它除以6。

sentences.en: More than one hundred police have ringed the area.
sentences.cn: 这一地区已被上百名警察包围。

sentences.en: Obsessives, in any area, are invariably as boring as their hobbies.
sentences.cn: 无论在哪个领域，过分痴迷者都会跟他们的癖好一样令人厌烦。

sentences.en: Only cheeses made in this area may be labelled ‘Roquefort.’
sentences.cn: 只有这个地区出产的干酪才能被称作“罗克福尔干酪”。

sentences.en: Rescue crews had scoured an area of 30 square miles.
sentences.cn: 救援人员已经搜遍了30平方英里的范围。

sentences.en: Security in the area will have to be reassessed.
sentences.cn: 这个地区的治安将会被重新评估。

sentences.en: The area has been the scene of fierce fighting for three months.
sentences.cn: 这一地区3个月以来不断发生激战。

sentences.en: The area where most refugees are waiting is exposed to the elements.
sentences.cn: 大多数难民等待救济的地方都不能挡风遮雨。

sentences.en: The course covers three main subject areas .
sentences.cn: 这门课程涵盖三大学科领域。

sentences.en: The course covers three main subject areas.
sentences.cn: 这门课程涵盖三大学科领域。

sentences.en: The space underneath could be used as a storage area.
sentences.cn: 底下的空间可用作储藏区。

sentences.en: The study links the main living area to the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 书房把主要的生活区与厨房连在一起。

sentences.en: They said the bodies were found when rebels recaptured the area.
sentences.cn: 他们说尸体是在叛军重新占领这个地区时发现的。

sentences.en: This study has clearly identified a major problem area for the National Health Service.
sentences.cn: 这次调查明确指出了国民医疗服务体系中的主要问题所在。

sentences.en: We are giving an equal area of land to the landless.
sentences.cn: 我们向无耕地者分发同等面积的土地。

sentences.en: We’re funding research into new areas such as law enforcement technology.
sentences.cn: 我们为执法技术等新领域的研究提供资金。

sentences.en: What drew him to the area was its proximity to central London.
sentences.cn: 吸引他到该地区的原因是那里靠近伦敦市中心。

words.tran_cn: 地区的；[数] 面积的；广大的

phrases.tran_cn: 在面积上；从面积上讲；在区域中
陆地区域；合模面面积；接触面积

trans.tran_cn: 地区，区域，地方，范围，面积
trans.tran_en: a particular part of a country, town etc
